title: Toy Story
author: John Lasseter
text: I wrote a blog post about why I hate video games. It appeals to a male fantasy!

title: The Undead are Coming
author: Zaboomafoo
text: We are not afraid of the undead anymore!

title: We Are Sparta
author: Mickey Mouse
text: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
text: I am the one who knocks!

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
text: Furtive ferrets feel forlorn. They are always looking for a place to hide.

title: Super Smash Brothers Melee
author: Adam Yamaguchi
text: I am sam. Sam I am. Do you like green eggs and ham? I do not like them Sam I Am. Would you like them in a house?

title: The Wump World
author: Bill Peet
text: This is one of the best articles Bill Peet ever wrote! Well done Bill Peet! We love you!

title: Smellovision
author: Willy Wonka
text: Gallant gorillas give great guff! Giddy goblins gambol gruff!

title: Standardized Generalized Markup Language
author: Vladimir Putin
text: Superman is a dead man baby.
